channel.title: Script Learner's rsps scripts request
channel.description:
I'm willing to write any script on any RSPS you want me to write, so post here if you don't know how to write it yourself and want me to write it for you.
First post first serve Totally FREE of charge No hacking etc....
NOTE: I'm Just a basic simba scripter so don't expect me to write scripts like a professional I may not be able to write script on some skills or make it bank it I dont write script for Rs only RSPS
[b]New [/b][b]Please use this format when you post here[/b] RSPS Website: Script you want: place: Anything Else?

item.title: Script Learner's rsps scripts request
item.dc:creator: @script_learner script learner
item.description:
@script_learner wrote:

[quote=“Echo_, post:10, topic:439474”]Put them in a loop with a counter:

var I: Integer; begin for I := 0 to 2 do begin RightClickVial; (* Whatever else you want repeated *) end; end.[/quote]
i do not understand this and when i try to put those to my scripts
it wont compile:(
but anyway my script work perfectly:)

Read full topic

item.title: Script Learner's rsps scripts request
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Put them in a loop with a counter:

var I: Integer; begin for I := 0 to 2 do begin RightClickVial; (* Whatever else you want repeated *) end; end.

Read full topic

item.title: Script Learner's rsps scripts request
item.dc:creator: @script_learner script learner
item.description:
@script_learner wrote:

[quote=“Echo_, post:8, topic:439474”][quote author=script learner link=topic=542168.msg3977416#msg3977416 date=1334815518]

Are you using an old revision of SRL or are you doing all of this with Simba’s built in functions?

I don’t know what you’re saying by built in functions,
all I know is that i have simba version 0.98 and know how to write working scripts on all rsps:)
[/quote]

Well your scripts would be shorter as well as more effective if you used the SRL library in your scripts, you would just need a version of the library that is compatible with the revision of RS that the private servers are based on.[/quote]

aww still I don’t really understand those things but I believe I will learn them eventually.

A question, How do you make a function repeat 3 times before it go to the next function
example: instead of putting
RightClickVial wait(200) until (BuyVial10) or (Login); 3 times how do you just make 1 call and let it repeat 3 times before it go to the next function call list

[code]
function RightClickVial: Boolean;
var
x, y : Integer;
begin
x := MSCX;
y := MSCY;
if FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, 7763317, 19, 25, 497, 318, 1) or
FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, 7104873, 19, 25, 497, 318, 1) or
FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, 11446440, 19, 25, 497, 318, 1) or
FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, 10065300, 19, 25, 497, 318, 1) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Vials in shop:)’);
MMouse(x, y, 4, 4);
Wait(100 + Random(100));
begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, false);
Result := True;
end
Writeln(’’);
end else
Writeln(‘Couldn’‘t find the color of the Vial in shop.’);
end;

function BuyVial10: Boolean;
var
rade, x, y : Integer;

begin
rade := BitmapFromString(74, 12, ‘meJzNlEsOwzAIRHu07nKBbHOn3t’ +
‘i1goSmHhiTyv1YLJDtAM8D2fZj24/2urZzc4mFAaeJ7o/Wjf2K8X3’ +
‘LdTvXQkCn6GE5l0hkFdpX6NfpwoyDvwQNo/EzhoD/T9fNEZguU1bT’ +
‘Vbo0o8N0WADe0X6mINPZJ1fp7MXct6MBWWg3jEOmaV1rQcfKMqCXy’ +
‘trhUbg/7cwP0dnrXaILK8c7Yk6/Tzf9dkrH2q2iC0e1Qjc0Z4MZzw’ +
‘B50LK/jabDUkOKoRKcU66w0eIjgRbW+V5neqm+sqOKOllMfhmBhtf’ +
‘EThi/ErloujN/a08W8nTo’);
if FindBitmapToleranceIn(rade, x, y, 0, 0, 852, 581, 1) then
begin
Wait (100 + random(100));
Writeln(‘Buy 10 vials!’);
MMouse(x, y, 4, 4);
begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
Result := True;
end
Writeln(’’);
end else
Writeln(‘Couldn’‘t buy Vials’);
FreeBitmap(rade);
end;

Command
RightClickVial wait(200) until (BuyVial10) or (Login);
RightClickVial wait(200) until (BuyVial10) or (Login);
RightClickVial wait(200) until (BuyVial10) or (Login); [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Script Learner's rsps scripts request
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

[quote=“script learner, post:7, topic:439474”][quote author=Echo_ link=topic=542168.msg3976088#msg3976088 date=1334674617]
Are you using an old revision of SRL or are you doing all of this with Simba’s built in functions?
[/quote]
I don’t know what you’re saying by built in functions,
all I know is that i have simba version 0.98 and know how to write working scripts on all rsps:)[/quote]

Well your scripts would be shorter as well as more effective if you used the SRL library in your scripts, you would just need a version of the library that is compatible with the revision of RS that the private servers are based on.

Read full topic
